thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 2 of 28
thread.title: Michal Wadowski

author: Michal Wadowski
title: Michal Wadowski
text: Shortly after I opened an account with Energia I was contacted by an insurance company pushing their product. Prior to that I had specifically asked Energia over the phone not to disclose my personal email/phone to any other commercial entity but clearly my request was ignored. It will not be forgotten when the time comes for me to choose new energy provider.
